summary_md: Albania's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 5,726 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.21% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG). The unemployment rate stands at 10.25% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), while the average life expectancy is 79.60 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN). The country has a significant internet user base, represented by 83.10% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The GDP growth rate is 36.11% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.labor_md: The labor market in Albania is marked by an unemployment rate of 10.25% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the percentage of the workforce that is jobless.
sections.digital_md: With an internet user base of 83.10% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Albania is progressively integrating digital technology into its societal fabric.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Albania is 79.60 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), suggesting the general health and living conditions of its population.
